awards.text: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 6 nominations.

fullplot: The story picks up four weeks after the first film, and already Bridget Jones is becoming uncomfortable in her relationship with Mark Darcy. Apart from discovering that he's a conservative voter, she has to deal with a new boss, strange contractor, and the worst vacation of her life.
plot: After finding love, Bridget Jones questions if she really has everything she's dreamed of having.
title: Bridget Jones: The Edge of Reason

tomatoes.consensus: Edge of Reason is a predictable continuation to the Bridget Jones story, with too much slapstick and silliness.
